title: Can Palou really take on Verstappen as Red Bull team-mate?
summary: With Red Bull searching for a long-term partner for Max Verstappen, rumours have linked IndyCar star Alex Palou with the seat - but is he truly ready to make the leap to Formula 1?

qa_pairs.question: Which team is currently seeking a long-term partner for Max Verstappen?
What series is Alex Palou currently competing in?
Who is the reigning world champion in Formula 1 as of 2023?
